p.s: Object-oriented interface to the session_* family functions
p.d: Object-oriented interface to the session_* family functions. It provides extra features such as database storage for session data using the DB, MDB, and MDB2 package as well as the Memcache extension. It introduces new methods like isNew(), useCookies(), setExpire(), setIdle(), isExpired(), isIdled() and others.
